title: Header with Responsive Navigation
description:
Build Global Header Component with Responsive Navigation

Create a reusable header component that serves as the primary navigation for the application, featuring brand identity, main navigation links, and responsive mobile menu functionality.

Requirements:
- Display logo/brand element in the header (left-aligned)
- Implement horizontal navigation menu with five links: Home, Services, Portfolio, About, Contact
- Add hamburger menu icon that appears on screens ≤768px width
- Implement toggle functionality for mobile menu (expand/collapse on hamburger click)
- Apply sticky positioning so header remains visible during scroll
- Include proper ARIA labels and attributes for screen reader accessibility (aria-label, aria-expanded, aria-controls)
- Ensure keyboard navigation support (tab order, enter/space to activate)
- Style active/current page link with visual distinction
- Add smooth transitions for mobile menu animation
- Ensure touch-friendly tap targets on mobile (minimum 44x44px)
- Test responsive behavior at common breakpoints (mobile, tablet, desktop)
- Verify header doesn't obstruct page content when sticky
